writer.name: 普昂索·阿克松萨旺 Puangsoi Aksornsawang

director.name: 普昂索·阿克松萨旺 Puangsoi Aksornsawang

introduction: Unrelenting relationships of 3 teenagers that cycle through a gentle roar of the waves in a swimming pool. For them, this swimming pool is an escape; a new world where they can let go, and seize slight of happiness and freedom to take back home. When in truth, they might not even know where or what their 'homes' are, nor the meaning of 'happiness and freedom' in the real world, above those silent waves of water.
